oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: (Not translated.) The Knorhaan (L II-9. 934 and 935). 1) There are various spellings for korhaan (such as khoran or knorhaan), 2) p.933v: the korhaan is an angry thing (quai ding) and is black, 3) This story is found in Book II-9.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: About the korhaan
